<div class="asset-content p402_premium subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<div class="subscriber-preview"><p>Village of Alma Center residents are able to consume their municipal drinking water again after two forms of bacteria were discovered in the system late last month.</p></div><div class="subscriber-preview"><p>The village instituted a boil advisory where residents were advised to heat their water before drinking it between Sept. 19 and Sept. 25, but the precaution since has been lifted after water system treatment and more testing.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>“When the (Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources) tells you, “Hey, you need to do this,’ we were concerned,” said Alma Center Village Clerk Claudia Fields.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/lacrossetribune.com/jacksoncochronicle/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-top, atf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-top-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>
<div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>“We were concerned about getting the notice out there.”</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Regular tests sent to the DNR came up positive for E. coli and coliform bacteria and prompted the state to ask Alma Center residents to boil water while the water system underwent treatment and extra equipment testing.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>No residents reported illness from drinking village water, but the presence of both bacteria was “serious enough” to prompt the advisory, said DNR environmental engineer Brian Pietz.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center "><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/lacrossetribune.com/jacksoncochronicle/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-inline-video, stf" data-dfp-size="[4,1]" data-lazy="true" id="fixed-inline-video" style="min-height:1px; min-width:4px;"></div></div>
<div class="subscriber-only"><p>“It’s serious enough to where we have to boil water,” he said. “Does it happen very often? Not a whole lot. You’ll see every so often someone has this occur.”</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Alma Center’s size calls for sending in two water samples a month, and the most recent test revealed the bacteria. It was the first time in 20 years the village had a test come back positive for bacteria, and the water system immediately underwent emergency chlorination and checks of the water tower, well and other equipment for any source of contamination.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/lacrossetribune.com/jacksoncochronicle/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-middle, stf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-middle-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>
<div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Pietz said it remains unclear what caused the bacteria to enter the system, and he’s not going to speculate on a source.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>“We’ve ruled out the usual sources, but we haven’t determined a cause,” he said.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Fields reiterated that the water currently is safe to consume and does not require boiling. She also thanked residents for their cooperation during the advisory.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>“The water is safe,” she said. “We appreciate their cooperation and understanding.”</p></div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"></div>
</div>

        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;
            var $region = $('#tncms-region-asset_side_sticky');

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&
                window.innerWidth >= 992
            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="asset_side_sticky-placeholder"></div>');
                $region.before($tempRegion);
                $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 80;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 80) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#site-footer-container')
                            ) {
                                $region.removeClass('affix')
                                $region.addClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 80);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });
            }
        });
    </script>

<div class="infinity-summary-container hidden-print" id="infinite-container">
<div data-next-url="http://lacrossetribune.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=88771915-5ffe-5566-8564-1d527d8b21e1&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube" id="infinite-more">
<i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i>
</div>
</div>
<script>
        
            var bFoundOrigin = true;
            var sOriginID = null;
        
        var sOriginURL = scrubURL('http://lacrossetribune.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=88771915-5ffe-5566-8564-1d527d8b21e1&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube'); // original url scrubbed for preview
        var sFirstID = null;
        var bFirstRun = true;
        var bShowAd = true;
        var bInfiniStop = false;

        function populateInfinitySet(sURL) {
            sURL = scrubURL(sURL);

            // Until the origin paramter for cms.search.mlt functions, we have to start/stop the looping on our own
            // This will require not displaying any assets until we hit oAsset.
            // Then we loop through and display until we've been through everything up to our origin

            $.ajax(sURL).then(function(oResponse, sStatus, oXHR) {

                var sNextUrl = null;

                if (typeof oResponse.next_url == 'undefined') {
                    // URL supplied is no good. Revert to original URL
                    sNextUrl = sOriginURL;
                } else {
                    sNextUrl = scrubURL(oResponse.next_url);
                }

                // Manage response
                if (typeof oResponse.assets != 'undefined' && oResponse.assets.length > 0) {
                    
                    // Remove old more data
                    $("#infinite-more").remove();

                    
                    // Build infinity set
                    $.each(oResponse.assets, function(index) {
                            if (index == 1 && sOriginID == null) {
                                sOriginID = oResponse.assets[0].id;
                            }
                        // Display assets once origin is found
                        if (bFoundOrigin == true) {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                bInfiniStop = true;
                                sNextUrl = null;
                                $("#infinite-more").remove();
                                
                            } else if (bInfiniStop == false && this.id != '88771915-5ffe-5566-8564-1d527d8b21e1') {
                                // Display asset
                                var sHTML = '';
                                if (this.content) {
                                    sHTML += '<div class="infinite-item original row"><div class="col-md-8">' + this.content + '</div><div class="col-md-4 text-center">';
                                    if (bShowAd == true) {
                                        // Show advertisement
                                        sHTML += '<div class="infinity-ad empty"></div>'
                                        bShowAd = false;
                                    } else {
                                        bShowAd = true;
                                    }
                                    sHTML += '</div></div><hr>';
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                // Origin found. Begin displaying assets
                                bFoundOrigin = true;
                            } else {
                                // Origin found is false. Skip asset
                                // Fail-safe in case origin is not present in set. This can be removed when origin is fixed.
                                if (bFirstRun == true) {
                                    // Stored first id
                                    sFirstID = this.id;
                                    bFirstRun = false;
                                } else if (this.id == sFirstID) {
                                    // We've started again. Force origin
                                    sOriginID = sFirstID;
                                    bFoundOrigin = true;
                                } // end Fail-safe
                            }
                        }
                        // Append infinity set to container
                        $("#infinite-container").append(sHTML);
                    });

                    // Include block_id on newly added list items
                    $('#infinite-container .infinite-item.original').each(function() {
                        var sHref = scrubURL($(this).find(".card-headline a").attr("href"));
                        
                        // Add to image and headlines links
                        $(this).removeClass('original')
                            .find(".card-headline a, .image a")
                            .attr("href", sHref + "#tncms-source=infinity-scroll-summary-siderail-latest");
                    });

                    // Check next URL
                    if (sNextUrl) {
                        // if origin hasn't been found yet and we hit next_url. Trigger the set to pull in again.
                        if (bFoundOrigin == false) {
                            // No origin yet. Call the populate function
                            populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                        } else {
                            // Append sNextUrl to infinity set
                            $("#infinite-container").append('<div id="infinite-more" data-next-url="' + sNextUrl + '"><i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i></div>');
                        }
                    }
                    
                        // Ad waypoint and handler to insert ads next to summary
                        $('.infinity-ad.empty').waypoint({
                            offset: '80%',
                            handler: function(direction) {
                                // Kill waypoint
                                this.destroy();
                                $(this.element).removeClass('empty');
                                // Create and append ad iframe. Make sure this occurs only once
                                var newIframe = infinityAd();
                                if($(this.element).children().length <= 0) {
                                    $(this.element).append(newIframe);
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    
                    // Refresh waypoints
                    Waypoint.refreshAll();
                } else {
                    // Empty asset set returned. Go back in for a real set
                    populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                }
            });
        }

        // Infinite waypoint
        var waypoint = new Waypoint({
            element: document.getElementById('infinite-container'),
            handler: function(direction) {
                if (direction == 'down') {
                    if (bInfiniStop == true) {                        
                        // FINISHED. Kill the waypoint
                        this.destroy();
                    } else {
                        // Log waypoint hit event
                        __tnt.trackEvent({'category':'infinity-scroll','action':'request', 'label':'assets requested', 'value': true});
                        var nextURL =  $('#infinite-more').data('next-url');
                        populateInfinitySet($('#infinite-more').data('next-url'));
                    }
                }
            },
            offset: 'bottom-in-view'
        });

        // Infinity ad
        function infinityAd() {
            var newIframe = document.createElement('iframe');
            newIframe.scrolling = 'no';
            newIframe.src = 'http://lacrossetribune.com/tncms/block/1449304/?disableTNStatsTracker=1';
            return newIframe;
        }
        // Rewrite URL to for preview
        function scrubURL(sURL) {
            if (typeof sURL != 'undefined'){
                return sURL;
            }
        }
    </script>

<div class="card-body">

        Concord teacher to be honored</a></h3>
</div>
<div class="card-lead">
<p>A Concord West Side Elementary School teacher will be recognized Saturday during halftime of the Big Ten Football Championship in Indianapolis for a project she and her students developed to help reduce waste and improve efficiency within the school’s drinking water system.</p>

<div class="asset-content subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<p>GOSHEN -- Homes along River Vista and Fair Oaks drives, between Westwood Road and Mayflower Place, are under a boil water order until further notice.</p><p>From 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. Thursday, Oct. 2, Goshen Utility crews are performing a scheduled water main shutdown to repair a main.</p>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset, atf","fold":"above","include_domain":"cnhi\/goshennews","size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/goshennews.com\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/"}' style="display:none;"></div>
<div data-refreshable="true" data-region="fixed-big-ad-top-asset">
</div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><p>After the main is repaired, water samples will be taken and analyzed for the presence of bacteria. If two consecutive tests pass, the boil order will be lifted.</p><p>Notice of the cancellation will be distributed through a customer flier and in The Goshen News.</p>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset, stf","fold":"span","include_domain":"cnhi\/goshennews","size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/goshennews.com\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/"}' style="display:none;"></div>
<div data-refreshable="true" data-region="fixed-big-ad-middle-asset">
</div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"><div class="tncms-block visible-xs" id="tncms-block-1150602">

<div class="clear" style="padding-bottom:10px"></div>
</div></div><p>Residents in that area should not consumer water without boiling it first. The water remains safe for bathing, laundry and restrooms. However, when cleaning dishes either use the sanitizing cycle of the dishwasher or, if hand-washed, rinse the dishes with boiled or bottled water.</p><p>For more information, call Mindy Kyle at the Goshen Water Department at 574-534-5306.</p>

        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;
            var $region = $('#tncms-region-asset_side_sticky');

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&
                window.innerWidth >= 992
            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="asset_side_sticky-placeholder"></div>');
                $region.before($tempRegion);
                $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 30;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 30) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#site-footer-container')
                            ) {
                                $region.removeClass('affix')
                                $region.addClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 30);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });
            }
        });
